review: He is a fantastic doctor. Very patient and answers any number of questions without getting irritated.makes us comfortable. Gives the actual condition of the patient. I was very happy with him.

Hi, He is really a good & patient friendly doctor.  But I do have a small request to him, please stop using Mobile phones while discussing with patients. Recently more frequently I could see you having telephonic conversions and parralelly asking patients about their health. This makes patient uncomfortable. When we pay 500 to 1000 bucks for consultation,  we would expect the proper attention being  paid for that 15 to 20 minutes.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor is very patient and friendly which is a key attribute. Explanation of the condition and the procedure was very good. The counselling session was useful.
